message: Keisen is a ghost town, fallen into ruin.
Ever since it was designated off-limits, it's become a dumping ground for all sorts of garbage.
Piles of refuse, from old furniture to rusted trucks, adorn the carcasses of warehouses and factories.
Of course, there's no one around. The place is eerie.
We proceed quickly, Clear leading the way, keeping a watchful eye on our surroundings.
As I look up at a massive pile of trash, I remember something.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This place... looks just like that game."

name: 紅雀
message: "Game?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "This thing I accidentally downloaded. It keeps updating itself."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But for some reason, the last one was a demo video instead of an actual game."

name: 蒼葉
message: "It had a character who looked like Granny getting carried away by bats. They took her to a trash mountain."

name: クリア
message: "This place certainly fits the description."

name: 紅雀
message: "It's just a coincidence."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Probably. I just thought it was weird."

name: ノイズ
message: "The garbage processing facility should be up ahead."
Noiz shows us the map on his Coil.

name: クリア
message: "It is."

name: ノイズ
message: "It should be the biggest building in the area."

name: 紅雀
message: "That looks like a good candidate."

name: クリア
message: "It's right up ahead."
Clear jogs ahead of us.
He used to take walks here? Talk about weird...
As we pick our way between the mountains of trash, a massive building comes into view. That must be it.

name: クリア
message: "...Just a moment."
Clear holds out an arm.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's wrong?"

name: クリア
message: "I can hear them. They're there. Inside."

name: 紅雀
message: "Hear what? I can't hear a damn thing."
I strain my ears to listen, but all I hear is the sound of the wind rustling through the trash.
But Clear seems deadly serious.

name: クリア
message: "I can hear them. Inside."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Let's go."
We approach the building cautiously.

Reaching the wall, I put my ear against the concrete.<K>
Clear was right. Though faint, I can hear people inside.

This is it. <K>
I touch the bag under my arm. Ren is sleeping inside.
